The following are the general prerequisites for installation:
Install nodejs 16 LTS
Review the following points with Sanjeev or Kushal (Remove it after confirmation)
If the following error message is displayed:
‘node’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file.
then update nodejs path in the Environment Variable.
Control Panel -> System and Security -> System -> Advanced system settings -> Environment Variables…
Install python 3.8.10
Review the following points with Sanjeev or Kushal (Remove it after confirmation)
To verify if python is installed, execute the command “python”
Install Amazon Corretto open JDK version 11
Review the following points with Sanjeev or Kushal (Remove it after confirmation)
To verify if Java is installed, execute the command “java --version”
Install Visual Studio (VS) Code
For Mac, install VS Code command in the path (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30065227/run-open-vscode-from-mac-terminal)
installer zip file is available in Altair Drive location at: /Users/<User Name>/MyFiles/ObjectStore_Installer/. Contact your Altair Support Channels if you do not have access to Altair Drive.
